mayor@bytebox:~/community$ cat welcome.txt

Welcome to my little corner of the internet!

I figured other people might have the same weird obsessions as me, so here's a place where we can all:

  • ‚ñ∂ Share homelab disasters and occasional victories
  • ‚ñ∂ Debug each other's infrastructure nightmares
  • ‚ñ∂ Discuss security stuff (the legal kind)
  • ‚ñ∂ Show off projects that shouldn't work but somehow do
  • ‚ñ∂ Ask questions without pretending we know everything
mayor@bytebox:~/community$ ls -la ./forums/
drwxr-xr-x ‚àû community bytebox live 24/7 discussions/ ‚Üí Main forum & knowledge base
drwxr-xr-x ‚àû community bytebox live 24/7 help-desk/ ‚Üí Get technical support
drwxr-xr-x ‚àû community bytebox live 24/7 showcase/ ‚Üí Show off your projects
drwxr-xr-x ‚àû community bytebox live 24/7 general/ ‚Üí Everything else
drwxr-xr-x ‚àû community bytebox live 24/7 ideas/ ‚Üí Feature requests & suggestions
mayor@bytebox:~/community$ cat community_guidelines.txt

// The Rules (such as they are) //

[1] Be excellent to each other - we're all figuring this out
[2] Share what you learn - hoarding knowledge is lame
[3] Stay curious - keep learning weird stuff
[4] Search first, ask second - but don't be afraid to ask
[5] Keep it legal - use your powers for good
